title: 154: Birth Story: Jess'“Unplanned” Birth & Birthing Choices
itunes:title: 154: Birth Story: Jess'“Unplanned” Birth & Birthing Choices
description:
Broads, first and foremost, please listen to the intro of this episode as The Broads discuss the recent and ongoing horrific acts of violence against Black people, their upcoming episode regarding racism, being an ally, and more. 
The Broads then get into their pre-recorded episode where they fall into a conversation about the details of Jess’ birth story which surprises Bekah! They chat about the importance of knowing all birth “plan” options and Bekah chats about how she is feeling with her upcoming birth and how it differs from her first. 
CHATTY BROADS WILL BE DONATION MATCHING UP TO $1500 FOR THE NATIONAL BLACK DOULAS ASSOCIATION (http://blackdoulas.org) THIS WEEK - You can participate and donate here: https://gf.me/u/x6nqyp
*Chatty Broads will be posting BLM resources, antiracist education work, action steps, ways to donate, and amplify black voices on the Instagram @chattybroads 
Thanks to our sponsors:
*** Tushy: hellotushy.com/chatty 
*** Firstleaf Wine Club: tryfirstleaf.com/chatty 
*** Feals: feals.com/chatty 
*** Freedom Debt Solutions: freedomdebtsolutions.com/chatty 
*** Pretty Litter: prettylitter.com use promo code: chatty

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
